ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 49
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well Tremor, I ve ask that very same question to almost every magician on Fennin Ro, including EVERY GM that i can get ahold of.  The standard reply is
ygData.messageBody:
>
> From: "Ben Humphreys" <benh@...>
>Subject: Summon Element Scroll
>
>The level 16 Magician Spell, Summon Heatstone requires a component called
>'Summon Element Scroll', does anyone know what this is? I'm thinking maybe
>it is any Summon Elemental (Pet) scroll.

>Tremor of Bristlebain

Well Tremor, I've ask that very same question to almost every magician on Fennin Ro, including EVERY GM that i can get ahold of. The standard reply is "Gee I don't know, i'll document it. Good luck!" Therefore i can only assume that Verant has NO ONE actually verifying the text put into the game. I do NOT think it's a pet scroll since most of them are used only for other pets. This was probbably a spell that was never put into the final, and since the Heatstone spell is able to be purchased, not many magicians have complained. I'd do a "FEEDBACK" to let them know. I already have as well.

Meraxes Glibilskym, Gnome Magician, Fennin Ro


Jordan
